patthana15.72:1.1: Araṇaṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.72:2.1: Saraṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.72:3.1: Araṇaṁ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
